(In reply to comment #0)
> I encountered null pointer exception when generating attached report, and I
> found this exception only happens when there are multiple drivers in oda driver
> folder. 

Is this referring to the BIRT oda.jdbc/drivers folder?
It appears the NPE might have been thrown by the oda.jdbc driver, especially since this occurs only when multiple jdbc drivers exist.

Re-assigning for further investigation.
